text:
Hi, the version in branches/rel-2-2 has two files in the extras folder related
to eclipse: eclipse.readme and eclipselaunch.txt.  These files have now been
made obsolete by the changes that Seb B. made to ROOT/eclipse.readme on 7 Mar 07
in resolving bug 41781.  Those changes add text that explains how to create an
eclipse launch configuration in Eclipse v3.  I suggest dropping the files. 
Thanks for listening.
creator: apache7@chris-lott.org
